Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao

Class TaskDao

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.AbstractDao<TaskEntity>
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.TaskDao
Record Components:
name - The name of the configuration to retrieve.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TaskDao extends AbstractDao<TaskEntity>
Retrieves the configuration value for a given configuration name.
